extendedInfo.description: 1) Install this app and run it.2) Go to browsertexting.com on your computer, pair your phone with your browser, and start texting away!>> Follow us on www.facebook.com/BrowserTexting for latest updates, features and bug-fixes <<We all know that typing text messages on a touchscreen smartphone is difficult and error prone. With BrowserTexting you use your computer keyboard.BrowserTexting allows you to use your computer to read and send SMS text messages - and uses your Android's mobile number, contacts and SMS/MMS functionality.While your phone is in the drawer, you can easily receive and send SMS text messages from your browser. Everything happens facebook-style with popup and sound notifications.Works with PC, Mac and Linux. Works with all browsers (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Safari, Opera, Firefox and others).Features:- No signup	- Receive SMS/MMS text messages directly in the browser	- Send SMS text messages directly from the browser- Group SMS (SMS to an unlimited number of recipients)	- Multi-browser support (up to 3 browsers)- Desktop notifications	- Sound notificationsRead more here: http://www.browsertexting.com/featuresMessages send from www.browsertexting.com or the chrome extension will appear in your mobile outbox as if they were sent from the phone itself. Any messages received on your mobile will appear in the browser or chrome extension (and still be on the mobile).You can still send/receive texts on your phone as you normally would.Keywords: SMS from Computer, SMS from browser, text messages, mightytext, google voice, remotesms, easysms, desksms, sms 2 desk, crosstxt, desktop SMS, write SMS from computer, droid messenger, droidmessenger, send sms text messages from computer, send sms from pc, send sms via computer.

reviews.title: Must Have!
reviews.comment: The best app on my Phone. Easy to use, smart UI, intelligent contact Syncing and Trustworthy. I couldnt ask for anything more. Maybe Copy and paste feature :P but thats about it.
reviews.author: Chrishra Strife

reviews.title: Awesome and Simple App
reviews.comment: I use this app for all my group messages and text messaging while at the computer.  Don\'t even have to pick up my phone.  Best of all it\'s simple and doesn\'t come with all this other bloatware.  The MMS feature is nice too!  Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: Matias Silva

reviews.title: Awesome App!!
reviews.comment: After six (6) months of daily use, this is by far the best app I have ever had.  I can send and receive texts all day through my computer and never have to pick up my phone.   I have not had any issues with connectivity or with sending or receiving.  There are times when I get the text quicker on my computer than on my phone.  Awesome app!!!! A must have!!!
reviews.author: Shannon DeWitt

reviews.title: browsertexting
reviews.comment: it keeps having a (Over Quota) but if you guys fix it ,I would probably buy it if you guys add more payment options like MolPoints and etc... but the most important part is that you guys should put more payment options for me too buy the Full Premium of this app  just add more payment options and i will give this a 5star
reviews.author: Neil Fernando

reviews.title: ON POINT & PERFORMS AS ADVERTISED SUPER FAST APP
reviews.comment: GREAT UTILITY THAT MAKES TEXTING POSSIBLE FROM YOUR COMPUTER WITH UTILIZING YOUR VERY OWN CELL PHONES NUMBER (JUST AS IF YOU SENT/RECEIVED VIA CELL PHONE)!  WORKS FLAWLESSLY AND DOUBLES AS A BACK UP APP FOR ALL YOUR TEXT MESSAGES...
reviews.author: mark gebo

reviews.title: Loving it.
reviews.comment: Easy to install and connect with my phone, intuitive, out of the way - in short, everything that I want from a computer SMS app. Loving it.
reviews.author: Bryan Elkins

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: I never buy apps, but for this one it was worth it. The pop-out chrome pluggin is GOLD and none of the other SMS things I\'ve found do that or work so simply.
reviews.author: Lucas Galey

reviews.title: Great app, suggestion for improvements
reviews.comment: App is great! Im giving it 5 stars because its overall great. Room for improvement is: 1. sync button (or refrest) 2. delivery reports requests 3. more skins/themes (different colors on both Chrome ext. and website)
reviews.author: Srdjan Marinkovic

reviews.title: NEEDS SOME WORK
reviews.comment: I LOVE TO BE ABLE TO TEXT AND HAVE A FULL CONVERSATION FROM MY COMPUTER HOWEVER I STILL HAVE TO LOOK AT MY PHONE FOR THE REPLIES AND ALSO IF YOU SOMETIMES TYPE MORE THAN 2 SENTENCES IT WILL NOT GO THROUGH AND YOU HAVE TO BREAK IT DOWN. OTHERWISE I LOVE IT. I WILL GO BACK AND CHANGE MY RATING AFTER THE BUGS ARE REMOVED.
reviews.author: Meme Penn

reviews.title: A Must Have App
reviews.comment: Easy to use, simple interface, has already replaced using my mobile while at computer!
reviews.author: Kate N

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: This is one of those simple apps that you really want because it just works. I have been using it for a while, with two different laptops and I am totally content. I would recommend.
reviews.author: Bob Hannent

reviews.title: its okey
reviews.comment: its okey but keep showing failed msgs when i check on my phone it shows i sent so many same msgs
reviews.author: Ayesha Ghani

reviews.title: Ahmed Coolbareeze
reviews.comment: its a very nice application i was searching from a long time ago. All the times I have to unlock my cell phone and to open the messages but this software makes my life easier. Nice work done
reviews.author: Mian Naseem

reviews.title: Great Job!
reviews.comment: All the other PC<>Phone apps wouldn\'t send the messages at my college, but it does the job when I use this app. 5 stars simply for that. :)
reviews.author: Jon Johnson

reviews.title: Token fails to validate
reviews.comment: 1st go, it just says expired .... attempt to renew just says invalid token ... so wont buy a token in case it days same.  So all it had done is read my texts ....uninstaling
reviews.author: graeme vetterlein

reviews.title: This app is great
reviews.comment: very easy to use and good that it recovers contacts as well to make it easier but it dosent seem to update with incoming messages quickly enough that could be improved
reviews.author: Marc Puddy

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Excellent! But I hope the phone and the computer can be synced permanently without scanning the barcode everytime.
reviews.author: Kenneth Quirante

reviews.title: Good features... and works .. but could be great with some additions
reviews.comment: The good news is pretty much everything works, which I can\'t saw is true for most of the other txt programs. I wish I could modify the group that I\'m sending to on the fly by checking or unchecking some of the members. Also , it\'d nice if I could add pictures to the message, I can see pics I\'ve sent and see pics that are sent to me, which is a little bit of a tease. I\'d also like to schedule text messages. These few addons and this messaging program will be clearly the most superior texting app out there.
reviews.author: Dillon Bracken

reviews.title: mike/ leicestershire
reviews.comment: I have been using this program for the last few months , and I have found it to be the best texting machine you could ever want , theres no cables to plug in no wifi just scan the barcode and you texting is up and running I love it I have tried other texting programs but this one is the best by a mile .  well done to the lads who developed this great program the best on the market .
reviews.author: mike emery

reviews.title: Really well written app!
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it claims to do, and works really well. Now I don\'t need to use my phone when I need to send a quick text and I\'m on the computer. Great job!
reviews.author: Ross Wilkinson
